title: Privacy Policy
intro: Applies to satucuaca.id and the Satu Cuaca apps (iOS/Android).
This policy explains how we collect, use, store, share, and protect your data—transparently and with user controls.

sections.title: Who we are & scope
items: Satu Cuaca is a real-time and predictive air-quality & weather platform.
Covers the website, mobile apps, API & dashboards (maps/widgets), and support communications.
Additional terms on specific features/pages apply together with this policy.

sections.title: Data you provide
items: Account & profile (if available): display name, email, hashed password, profile photo (optional).
Support/messages: message content, attachments, correspondence metadata.
Preferences: language, favorite locations/stations, notification settings.

sections.title: Data from your device
items: Location—approximate or precise, only with your permission; you can revoke anytime.
Device & usage data: device model, OS, app version, time zone, IP, random identifiers, and app events.
Diagnostics: crash logs and performance metrics (latency, errors).

sections.title: Environmental data (non-personal)
items: Sensor readings and AQI/weather sources (PM2.5/PM10, O₃, NO₂, SO₂, CO, temperature, humidity, wind, rain, UV, radar/satellite) and model/nowcast outputs.
This data does not identify individuals and may be used in aggregate.

sections.title: Cookies & similar tech (web)
items: Essential cookies for auth, security, language.
Analytics to measure usage; no cross-site ad tracking.
Local storage for settings (theme, favorite places).
Mobile apps do not use cookies but may use local storage.

sections.title: How we use data
items: Core service: show AQI/weather conditions, timing/location recommendations, maps, favorites.
Notifications (if enabled): rain/AQI alerts based on thresholds and your preferences.
Personalization: language, units, content order, nearby stations.
Analytics & quality: model accuracy (e.g., MAE/RMSE/SMAPE), stability, and performance.
Security: abuse/attack mitigation and rate-limiting.
Legal compliance: respond to lawful requests and obligations.
We **do not** sell your personal data or use cross-site ad tracking.

sections.title: Legal bases
items: Contract: to provide the services you request.
Legitimate interests: security, diagnostics, minimal-impact analytics.
Consent: precise location, notifications, and optional analytics (revocable anytime).
Legal obligation: retention/disclosure where required.

sections.title: Sharing with third parties
items: Infrastructure & networking (CDN/DNS, servers, DDoS mitigation).
Certificate & security providers (TLS/server security).
Analytics & diagnostics (usage/crash) pseudonymized/aggregated when feasible.
Email & support communications.
Integrations you request (e.g., map widgets or meteorological open data).
Law enforcement/authorities when legally required.
Partners are bound to process per our instructions, keep confidentiality, and apply adequate security.

sections.title: Retention
items: Server/security logs: 30–90 days.
Diagnostics/crash: ≤ 12 months.
Aggregated analytics: ≤ 24 months.
Local app preferences: until you delete the app/data.
Environmental (non-personal) data: may be retained longer for historical analysis.
Longer retention may be required by law.

sections.title: Your rights
items: Access & rectification of inaccurate data.
Restriction/objection to certain processing.
Portability in a structured format.
Withdraw consent (location/notifications/optional analytics).
Contact us to exercise rights; identity verification may be required.

sections.title: Security
items: HTTPS/TLS, server hardening, need-to-know access control, anomaly monitoring, and managed backups.
No system is 100% secure; if an incident affects your data, we will notify per applicable rules.

sections.title: Children
items: Not intended for children under 13 (or local minimum age).
We do not knowingly collect children’s personal data; contact us for removal if needed.

sections.title: Cross-border transfers
items: Infrastructure/partners may be located in other countries.
We use recognized mechanisms (e.g., standard contractual clauses) and ensure adequate protection.

sections.title: User controls & preferences
items: Location: deny/revoke permission in OS settings or use manual search.
Notifications: toggle in app/OS settings.
Cookies (web): manage via banner/browser settings.
Optional analytics (if present): provide an opt-out switch in settings.

sections.title: Contact
items: Email: admin@satucuaca.id
Please describe your request and, if needed, the email used so we can verify and assist.

sections.title: Policy changes
items: We may update this policy to reflect feature, practice, or legal changes.
Material changes will be clearly communicated (banner, email, or in-app prompt).

sections.title: Quick summary
items: We collect the minimum necessary; location only with your permission.
We use data to show AQI/weather, recommendations, alerts, and to improve quality.
We do not sell your data; sharing is limited to necessary partners.
You control permissions and can request access/deletion.
